examples: (P):  Equisetum fluviatile L. f. attenuatum (Milde) Vict. ex Dutilly & Lepage, Naturaliste Canad. 72: 269. 1945; (S): Aster ciliolatus var. borealis (J.Rousseau) Dutilly & Lepage, Naturaliste Canad. 74: 264. 1947
source: from R.E.G.Pichi Sermolli 1 March 1991; Death year from: Anthropologie et missiologie: XIXe-XXe siècles : entre connivence et rivalite ... p. 163, footnote 7. 2003 (via Kim Damboise (QFA))
